CLN&DRTY The Clarifying Water

Brand: CLN&DRTY

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Witch Hazel (Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Distillate), Organic Apple Cider Vinegar (Certified Organic Raw Apple Cider Vinegar, Purified Water), Hyaluronic Acid (Sodium Hyaluronate), Salicylic Acid (Salicylic Acid, Cocamidopropyl Dimethylami

dopropyl Dimethylamine), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Lemongrass Essential Oil (Cymbopogon Flexuosus), Bulgarian Lavender Oil (Lavandula Angustifolia), Optiphen

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
